timeline.bodyText: We could use a highway tag configurable value here in case we'd ever want to change the list of acceptable highway tags.
timeline.author: danielduhh

replies.bodyText: Thanks, Daniel. I have made the filter configurable.
replies.author: ladwlo

timeline.message: Making highway type filter configurable (code review remark)

timeline.bodyText: When flagging an Edge we generally want to flag all of the main edges with that OSM ID. This makes it less confusing if the flags are used to create MapRoulette challenges. See InvalidTagsCheck for an example.
timeline.author: Bentleysb
Bentleysb

timeline.message: Flagging all Edges of a related OSM Way (code review remark)
Adding the tunnel/bridge maxheight check to the list of available checks
